body:
## I'd like to say thanks to:

* [HTML5 UP](http://html5up.net/) for the website design. They have loads of awesome designs for pretty much any purpose you want, go check them out!
* [11ty](https://www.11ty.dev/), [netlify](https://www.netlify.com/), [netlify-cms](https://www.netlifycms.org/) and [cloudflare](https://www.cloudflare.com/) for making this website possible.
* [Fox icons created by Freepik - Flaticon](https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/fox) for providing the beatiful website icon.
* [Unsplash ](https://unsplash.com/)for their wonderful collections of images, of which I have used a handful just on this website alone.
* [FontAwesome](https://fontawesome.com/) and [DevIcon](https://devicon.dev/) provide the icons you see all around the website.
